nodes.text: The UR-40M patrol speeder was a model used on Iridonia around the time of the Old Sith Wars. Created by Ubrikkian Repulsorlift Manufacturing, it could achieve 800 kilometers per hour. It required one pilot, carried seven passengers plus sixty kilograms of cargo, and had a gunner-operated blaster cannon. A new vehicle cost 55,000 credits, but a used one only cost 30,000.
